name: World of English
description:
World of English - an educational game that has a goal to help students study English. The game was developed by Aleksandr Molchagin (a pupil of 11th grade from Borisoglebskaya gymnasium № 1 that is located in Borisoglebsk, Russia) as a school project with Unreal Engine 4. The game includes one level and  three difficulty levels: Elementary, Intermediate, Advanced.  Some  game assets are under either CC Attribution license or CC0.1.0 Universal license.   

Hope that you'll enjoy it! 

Controls:

WASD - movement;

Mouse input - camera;

W + shift (hold) - running;

Space - jump, climb;

W (hold) + Shift (hold) + Space - long jump (for platforms);

W (hold) +  Left Alt -  the same long jump (for platforms);

Escape - pause.
